name: SaveTheBunker
description:
"Save the bunker" is a game about a brave repaircat in a spacesuit with a jetpack. This cat repairs bunkers that shoot back from hordes of aggressively licking reptilian dogs.

Hold the bunkers as long as you can!

Game Design, Develop - Oleg ukirain Pavlovski
Develop - Nadezhda ani_wolf Kovalenko
Art - Maria furraran  Budasova
Art - Denis dept Pitruk
Sound Design - Yuriy Bulavin
